Investitions

Why you should choose us

Innovation

We're the first credit card company in the world to introduce artificial intelligence and fingerprint technology. Creditprint is also the first banking service to go fully renewable by 2030.

Inclusivity

As a company, Creditprint's philosophy includes humans of every race, gender and sexual orientation. We're also focused on bringing our services to everyone around the world, regardless of their financial situation. We believe everyone should get equal chances.

Leaders

Creditprint is the leading banking company in Romania and the biggest credit card middleman in Eastern Europe. Our reputation is represented by the quality of our services.

Fully private and encrypted

We the people here at Creditprint take your privacy very seriously. That's why our card doesn't save important information without encrypting and making sure it is stored safely.
